hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali called for (water for) Wudu', then he rinsed his mouth and nose, and he sniffed up water and blew it out using his left hand. He did that three times, then he said:"This is how the Prophet of Allah (ﷺ) purified himself

chapter.eng-name: Which Hand Should One Use To Sniff Water Into The Nose?
